To answer your question, docking ports can only dock with other docking ports of the same type. Also, if you update to 0.21.1 and turn on fine control mode with caps lock, RCS automatically balances when translating so it doesn't cause rotation.

To answer your question, docking ports can only dock with other docking ports of the same type.

More accurately, they can only dock with other ports of the same size. So, for instance, both of the docking ports that have animated enclosures are medium sized docking ports, and can dock with each other as well as the medium sized clamp o trons.
